statements: SELECT * FROM microbiome_data
SELECT sample_id, bacteria_name FROM microbiome_data
SELECT bacteria_name, abundance FROM microbiome_data WHERE sample_id = 1
SELECT * FROM microbiome_data WHERE abundance > 0.5
SELECT sample_id, abundance FROM microbiome_data ORDER BY sample_id DESC
SELECT * FROM microbiome_data ORDER BY sample_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT bacteria_name, abundance FROM microbiome_data WHERE abundance > 0.5 ORDER BY abundance DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT sample_id, bacteria_name, abundance FROM microbiome_data WHERE bacteria_name = 'E.coli'
SELECT * FROM microbiome_data WHERE sample_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT sample_id, SUM(abundance) AS total_abundance FROM microbiome_data GROUP BY sample_id HAVING total_abundance >= 2
SELECT * FROM gut_microbiome_data;
SELECT sample_id, bacteria_name FROM gut_microbiome_data;
SELECT bacteria_name, bacteria_count FROM gut_microbiome_data ORDER BY bacteria_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_participants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT participant_id, age, gender FROM research_participants WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM gut_microbiome_data WHERE bacteria_count > 100 ORDER BY bacteria_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sample_id, bacteria_name, bacteria_count FROM gut_microbiome_data WHERE bacteria_count < 50 ORDER BY bacteria_count ASC, bacteria_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT bacteria_name) AS unique_bacteria_count FROM gut_microbiome_data;
SELECT * FROM research_participants WHERE age >= 30 AND location = 'New York' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT participant_id, age, gender, location FROM research_participants WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY participant_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM bacteria;
SELECT species, genus FROM bacteria WHERE abundance > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM samples ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM research WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT species, genus, abundance FROM bacteria WHERE genus = 'E.coli';
SELECT * FROM bacteria WHERE genus = 'Escherichia' ORDER BY abundance DESC;
SELECT species, abundance FROM bacteria WHERE abundance > 0.5;
SELECT sample_location, collection_date FROM samples WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic, publication_date FROM research ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM samples JOIN bacteria ON samples.patient_id = bacteria.id;
SELECT * FROM samples;
SELECT sample_id, location, sample_type FROM samples WHERE sample_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM participants WHERE age > 25;
SELECT bacteria_name, bacteria_species, detection_method FROM bacteria WHERE bacteria_species = 'E. coli';
SELECT data_id, abundance FROM microbiome_data ORDER BY abundance DESC;
SELECT * FROM samples WHERE sample_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, age FROM participants ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT samples.sample_id, samples.location, bacteria.bacteria_name FROM samples JOIN microbiome_data ON samples.sample_id = microbiome_data.sample_id JOIN bacteria ON microbiome_data.bacteria_id = bacteria.bacteria_id WHERE samples.location = 'Laboratory' AND bacteria.bacteria_species = 'Escherichia coli';

SELECT participants.participant_name, bacteria.bacteria_name, microbiome_data.abundance FROM participants JOIN samples ON participants.participant_id = samples.participant_id JOIN microbiome_data ON samples.sample_id = microbiome_data.sample_id JOIN bacteria ON microbiome_data.bacteria_id = bacteria.bacteria_id WHERE participants.age > 30 AND bacteria.detection_method = 'PCR';

SELECT participants.participant_name, MIN(microbiome_data.abundance) AS min_abundance, MAX(microbiome_data.abundance) AS max_abundance FROM participants JOIN samples ON participants.participant_id = samples.participant_id JOIN microbiome_data ON samples.sample_id = microbiome_data.sample_id GROUP BY participants.participant_name;
SELECT sample_id, microbiome_species, abundance FROM gut_microbiome_data WHERE sample_id = 1
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50
SELECT study_name, publication_date FROM research_studies ORDER BY publication_date DESC
SELECT patient_id, age, gender, health_condition FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM sample_collection JOIN research_studies ON sample_collection.research_study_id = research_studies.study_id
SELECT * FROM gut_microbiome_data ORDER BY abundance DESC;
SELECT sample_id, microbiome_species, abundance FROM gut_microbiome_data WHERE abundance > 0.5;
SELECT patient_id, age, health_condition FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM research_studies WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, microbiome_species, abundance FROM gut_microbiome_data JOIN patient_samples ON gut_microbiome_data.sample_id = patient_samples.sample_id;
